casebody.data:
PHILIPS
v.
PITT COUNTY MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, INC., et al. No. 368P12-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. C. David Creech, New Bern, for Pitt County Memorial Hospital Incorporated, et al. Jay C. Salsman, New Bern, for Pitt County Memorial Hospital Incorporated, et al. Sherif A. Philips, Greenville, for Philips, Sherif A. (M.D.).

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of November 2015 by Plaintiff for Petition for Reconsideration:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
